text: Hildur Nygren was a teacher and Swedish politician with the Social Democrats. She sat in the Riksdag from 1941 to 1952, becoming the second female cabinet minister and the first female minister of education in Swedish history.https://www.minnenasjournal.nu/mors-dag-100-ar-sa-borjade-vi-fira- mor/hildur-nygren/ == References == == Further reading == * Category:Women government ministers of Sweden Category:Members of the Riksdag Category:Women members of the Riksdag Category:People from Gävle Category:Swedish Social Democratic Party politicians Category:20th-century Swedish women politicians Category:1896 births Category:1962 deaths
title: Hildur Nygren
